quote: Yet all three animals were keyed to a tenseness of living that was almost painful, and scarcely ever would it come to them to be more alive than they were then in their seeming petrifaction.
quote_letters: YET ALL THREE ANIMALS WERE KEYED TO A TENSENESS OF LIVING THAT WAS ALMOST PAINFUL AND SCARCELY EVER WOULD IT COME TO THEM TO BE MORE ALIVE THAN THEY WERE THEN IN THEIR SEEMING PETRIFACTION
